events.name: Registration
events.description:
Registration, breakfast, and distribution of event passes.
Atleast one member from a team should be present for registration.

events.name: Event briefing
events.description: Networking among participants, judge introductions, and event briefing: rules and marking schemes. Check internet connections, confirm google classroom access. Double confirm everthings working and we are ready to roll.

events.name: Hackathon Begins
events.description:
With problem statement or event's theme released right before 8:00 AM, the hackathon begins. Participants will have 9 hours to work on their projects.
Participants are provided with a meal and snacks coupon. They can visit canteen anytime during the event to claim. There's no dedicated time for lunch. Tired of coding? Take a break and maybe play some games. Roam around the college. Help your self with rasna/tang and coffee available thorughout the day.
Mentors will be making rounds to check on every teams and help them with their projects. They will guide you to a right path if you found yourself lost.

events.name: Time to wrap up
events.description:
Prepare to wrap up your project. Make sure to submit your whole work's zip file before 5:30 PM in google classroom link provided to each team leader at the start of event.
Immediately call a voulnteer if you are facing any issues with submission.

events.name: Break before pitching
events.description: Break before pitching. No presentation is required. Just preprare how your team is going to demonstrate your project to the judges. Make sure to have a backup of your work in case of any technical issues.

events.name: Closing
events.description: Closing ceremony. Few wise words from guests. Token of love for judges and mentors. Certificates for all the participants. Winners won't be announced that day.
